headline: Advisor Team with Over $300 Million In Assets Joins Ameriprise Financial for Independence, Leadership and Financial Planning Capabilities
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, June 16, 2025--Private wealth advisory practice, Allegiant Private Wealth, recently joined the independent channel of Ameriprise Financial, Inc. (NYSE: AMP) from Merrill Lynch with over $300 million in assets. The practice, located in Ocean City, M.D. is led by Private Wealth Advisor Christine Selzer, CFP®, and includes Private Wealth Advisors Brian Selzer, CRPC™ and Brody Grove, CFP®. The move was driven by the team’s desire for greater independence and a stronger emphasis on inves

content.title: Advisor Team with Over $300 Million In Assets Joins Ameriprise Financial for Independence, Leadership and Financial Planning Capabilities
